named-query.name: findBooksByAuthor
named-query.query: from Book b where b.author.id = :id order by b.title

named-query.name: findBooksByDate
named-query.query: from Book b where b.published between :startDate and :endDate

named-query.name: findBooksByTitle
named-query.query: from Book b where lower(b.title) like :title order by b.title

named-query.name: findAllBooks
named-query.query: from Book b order by b.title

named-query.name: findAllAuthors
named-query.query: from Author a order by a.name
